short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Logs password fields unless the URL is defined on a whitelist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Passfieldlogger is created for internal use within our company. We would like to create an inventory of our users, where passwordfields are used. The URL will be sent to an internal webserver if a passwordfield is used.
